name: Kapi Test FNF
description:
It's Kapi from Week "Kapi" from Friday Night Funkin Vs. Kapi! Go crazy with Kapi's beeps and bops! Credits do really go to PaperKitty for making the Friday Night Funkin Vs. Kapi mod! :) Play on the web here on a PC/Mobile devices! If you want, you can download it with the download button below for Windows, Mac, and Linux systems!

Controls: 

To switch to touch control, touch the toggle in game.

Arrow keys to play the sounds

Hold Space and arrow keys for secondary sounds

Press 1 for NYAW! :)

Secret Key = ??? ;)

Hold any of the buttons to hold a pose!

Check out the Friday Night Funkin here: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin
